scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p ../back_pong-game/public/dist && cp public/index.html ../back_pong-game/public/ && cp -r dist/* ../back_pong-game/public/dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd ../back_pong-game && npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run build && cd ../back_pong-game && npm start
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run start
